survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Grocery Shopping Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have used contactless grocery shopping services, to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use contactless grocery shopping services?
questions.client_notes: Recommended scale: Frequency-based options to capture usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use contactless grocery shopping services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following contactless grocery shopping features do you value the most?
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice to identify preferred features. Include an 'Other' option for flexibility.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using contactless grocery shopping services?

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for contactless grocery shopping services?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend contactless grocery shopping to others?
